body.name: Nine West Mens Belt Vegan Leather Regular | Reversible Dress Casual Everyday Belt, Designed in the USA
features: Care instructions Spot Cleaning with a damp cloth

VEGAN LEATHER CONSTRUCTION: Our vegan belts were crafted using durable but supple, high-end synthetic leather that won't stretch or crack like poor-quality leather can and is more environmentally friendly than leather. These detail oriented vegan belts feature a smooth strap with tonal, heavy-duty edge stitching, and nickel buckle, making it an all-season accessory and an everyday use belt. Heavy-Duty construction belts for men are made to last and never let you down.

Animal-friendly, Sustainable Fashion: True vegan products allow you to be both trendy and ethical, fun and animal-friendly. The NINE WEST men’s belts go perfectly with many outfits, whether casual clothing or something dressy. Authentic Belts knows fashion doesn’t have to be cruel to be fabulous! In this day and age, you can be both stylish AND ethical. GRS Certified.

ESSENTIAL VEGAN ALTERNATIVE TO LEATHER – Mens Belts Casual and Dress belts for men. Brown or black color goes equally well with a suit for the office or on everyday jeans when casually dressed. Stay true to your beliefs and keep it cruelty-free with these vegan belts. Made from recycled materials or able to be recycled, our vegan belts give you style with a clear conscience as it guarantees of a classic design for a modern look every time.

VERSATILE FITS - Available in small, medium, large, and extra large. Each mens belt features seven size-adjusting holes to make belt fits more waistline size. It’s suggested to purchase a mens belts leather that’s two inches larger than your pant size for the best fit. (7) seven holes for easy adjustments. Highly Matches suit pants, jeans, khakis and any formal wear; never go out of style with classic yet stylish design of this belt.

Great As A Gift: We attach great importance to the quality of the belts for men with sustainable leather, as it would add a timeless look that are made for your everyday life. We craft sturdy yet fashionable men's belts from work to family time, which makes them perfect gifts for men, your friends, and families.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Decent belt at a decent price
reviews.reviewText: These things don't last as long as leather, but even leather wears out, and it's not an option for some people anyway. I had wanted a brass color at first, but they don't offer that, so I went with the polished nickel and it was fine. It's nice enough looking that you can wear it with whatever you need to, and it's functional as well. I went with the X-Large version and I probably had *somewhere* around a 38 waist at the time and it was just about right (it's come down significantly since then and I'm nearing the end of the holes, but it's still doing the job as my pants start to fall off my waist unless they have help).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars NINE WEST Men's Belt: Stylish, Durable, and Ethically Conscious
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the NINE WEST Men's Belt made from vegan leather, and I must say it has exceeded my expectations. This belt not only offers a stylish and sophisticated look but also provides the durability and versatility that I require.One of the standout features of this belt is its high-quality vegan leather construction. The material looks and feels remarkably close to genuine leather, but with the added benefit of being cruelty-free and more environmentally friendly. The belt has a smooth and sleek texture that adds a touch of elegance to any outfit.In terms of design, the NINE WEST Men's Belt showcases a timeless and classic aesthetic. The buckle is well-crafted and sturdy, providing a secure fastening that stays in place throughout the day. The overall design is sleek and minimalistic, making it suitable for both formal and casual occasions. This versatility is a major plus as I can easily pair it with dress pants, jeans, or khakis, elevating my overall look effortlessly.Durability is another area where this belt excels. The vegan leather material is resilient and has shown no signs of wear or cracking even with regular use. The stitching is solid and reinforces the overall strength of the belt. I appreciate that I can rely on this accessory to withstand the test of time, ensuring long-lasting value for my investment.Furthermore, the NINE WEST brand has always been associated with quality and attention to detail, and this belt lives up to that reputation. The overall craftsmanship and finish are impeccable, with no loose threads or imperfections. It's evident that this belt has been carefully made with a focus on delivering a premium product to customers.In terms of fit, the belt comes in a variety of sizes, allowing for a customized and comfortable wearing experience. The range of sizes ensures that you can find the perfect fit for your waist, and the adjustable buckle provides additional flexibility if needed.In summary, the NINE WEST Men's Belt made from vegan leather is a fantastic accessory for any gentleman looking for style, durability, and ethical consideration. With its impeccable craftsmanship, timeless design, and sustainable materials, this belt offers an excellent balance of fashion and functionality. Whether you're dressing up for a formal event or adding a touch of sophistication to your everyday attire, this belt is a reliable choice that will elevate your look with its sleek and versatile design.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These are very attractive and are holding up pretty good so far. Some days it fits good and some days I struggle to find the proper fit. I think it may be me and not the belt.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Maybe okay for occasional wear but not everyday
reviews.reviewText: This belt looked great for about two months of regular use but then it started to show wear and deteriorated quickly. This photo shows three months of regular wear. Not every day, but most days. The thick core of the belt is broken and only the thin faux leather covering is holding it together. It’s a nice looking belt and would be fine for occasional use for formal occasions but doesn’t stand up to daily wear.
